name: Yitzi - Video Yahtzee
description:
Yitzi is a game of Yahtzee with a theme similar to that of video poker (something I've always liked).
If you just want to quickly bang out a few games of yahtzee, this may be the way to go! Challenge yourself by trying to beat your high scores.
How to play
To roll dice, press x
Every other action just use your mouse. At the end of each turn,  roll again. When you've finished a whole round, roll to start a new game.
